articles.title: Eruption of Mount Vesuvius turned its victims' brains to GLASS - Daily Mail
articles.description: Inhabitants of Herculaneum in Italy were swiftly reduced to piles of charred bones and ash when Vesuvius erupted in AD 79, experts at University of Roma Tre report.
